questions.question: Consider the vector space R<sup>3</sup> over R. The co-ordinates of (1, 2, 3)∈R<sup>3</sup> w.r.t. basis {(1, 0, 1), (0, 1, 1), (1, 1, 0)} of R<sup>3</sup> are:
Consider the vector space R<sup>3</sup> over R. Then which of the following is true?

answers.a: {(1, 0, 1), (2, -1, 0)} spans R<sup>3</sup> and is its basis.
answers.c: {(1, 0, -1), (2, -2, -1), (0, 0, 0)} spans R<sup>3</sup> with and is its basis.
answers.d: {(1, 0, 0), (0, 1, -1), (2, 0, -3)} spans R<sup>3</sup> with and is its basis.

questions.question: The order of following matrix is: $$ \begin{pmatrix} x  &  x+y  \\ y+z & z  \end{pmatrix} $$

Let T: R2→R3 be a map. Then
A: T(0, 0)=(0, 0, 0)
B: T(-1, 2)=-T(1, 2)

answers.a: A is true, B is false
answers.b: A is true, B is true
answers.c: A is false, B is true
answers.d: A is false, B is false

questions.question:
Consider the vector space R3 over R. Let
A: Zero of the vector space is 0.
B: Additive inverse of (2, 3, 4)∈R3 is 1/2, 1/3, 1/4

answers.a: A is true, B is false
answers.b: A is true, B is true
answers.c: A is false, B is true
answers.d: A is false, B is false
